cast.name: 苏珊娜·伍艾斯特 Susanne Wuest

writer.name: 杰茜卡·豪斯纳 Jessica Hausner

director.name: 杰茜卡·豪斯纳 Jessica Hausner

introduction: Posed as an artistic video installation, Jessica Hausner focuses, in this short film of just under an hour, on the domestic routine of a girl who enters the kitchen and prepares a sandwich in a methodical and mechanical way. A daily and apparently banal action that is repeated over and over until reaching a kind of obsessive sublimation as absurd as existential. With actress Susanne Wuest, star of "Goodnight Mommy". "Toast" was created in cooperation with Kunsthaus Graz and the Diagonale Filmfestival 2006.
